blackKnifeTiche.name: Black Knife Tiche ashes
blackKnifeTiche.description:
One of the assassins who killed Godwin the Golden with the rune of death on her black blade in the night of the conspiracy.

Tiche, the daughter of Alecto, the chief of the Black Blades, lost her life protecting her mother during her flight from the Royal Capital.

mausoleumSoldiers.name: Ashes of mausoleum soldiers
mausoleumSoldiers.description:
Summons 5 mausoleum soldiers spirits

The headless bodies of five soldiers, who disappear and reappear at will, toying with the enemy.

The mausoleum is the mortuary of the soulless demigods whose soldiers are martyrs who lost their own heads.

nobleSorcerer.name: Ashes of a noble sorcerer
nobleSorcerer.description:
Summon the spirit of a noble sorcerer.

Spirit of the nobleman who once learned glintstone magic by knocking on the door of the magic academy Raya Lucaria.

But his talent is not worthy to wear the glintstone head, and can use only the most rudimentary magic.

nomad.name: Ashes of a nomad
nomad.description:
Summons the spirit of a nomad

Spirit of a member of a family buried in the earth, calling forth a mad disease.

His eyes emit a terrible, mad fire, but he is a sickly man, with low HP and is weak.

putridCorpses.name: Ashes of rotting corpses
putridCorpses.description:
Summons 4 rotting wraith spirits.

Spirits are summoned to a far location

Their movement is slow, but they attract the enemy with their grunts and moans.

And they don't die easly.

skeletalMilitiaman.name: Ashes of Militia Skeleton
skeletalMilitiaman.description:
Summon 2 militia skeleton spirits.

Spirits of those who live in death, who will rise again and again unless they are stopped.

The unholy end of those touched by the root of death

wanderingNoble.name: Ashes of Wandering Noblemen
wanderingNoble.description:
Summons 5 wandering noble spirits

The spirits of the nobles who wandered in and out the Lands Between, they must have been looking for something, but now they seem to have forgotten what it is.

consumableFlaskOfCrimsonTears.name: Scarlet Drop Chalice Bottle
consumableFlaskOfCrimsonTears.description:
A bottle in the shape of a golden chalice that once received drops of grace.

Filled with scarlet drops, HP is restored by use or replenished by resting in blessing.

The body that should have washed up in the graveyard and simply died was perhaps healed by this, to seek the Elden ring

consumableFlaskOfCeruleanTears.name: Blue Drop Chalice Bottle
consumableFlaskOfCeruleanTears.description:
A bottle in the shape of a golden chalice that once received drops of grace.

Filled with blue drops, FP is recovered through use, also replenished by resting in blessings.

The body that should have washed up in the graveyard and simply died was perhaps healed by this, to seek the Elden ring
